Name: Warrior
Message: Where am i? Who am I?

Name: Guide
Message: You're a fallen warrior who must face one last battle to make your way into the after life

Name: Guide
Message: In order to reach the peacefull after life you must find your Elven Apple or you'll be trapped here for eternity

Name: Guide
Message: I'll guide you through this purgatory but you'll have to do the hard work, now off you go!
